official-title.#text:
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4500 Sunny Isle Shopping
			 Center in Christiansted, St. Croix, United States Virgin Islands, as the

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

located at 4500 Sunny Isle Shopping Center in
			 Christiansted, St. Croix, United States Virgin Islands, shall be known and
			 designated as the

text.#text:
Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to
			 the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a
			 reference to the

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5466 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4500 Sunny Isle Shopping Center in Christiansted, St. Croix, United States Virgin Islands, as the “Florence Louise Thomas Post Office”.
